verbose_text: We focused on IKKalpha, IKKbeta, IKKepsilon, canonical and non canonical kinases known to be important for the phosphorylation of p65 XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR; PP2A, a serine phosphatase that dephosphorylates p-p65 (phosphorylated p65) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR; WIP1, a PP2C family number XREF_BIBR, and TC45, a tyrosine phosphatase that interacts with GdX XREF_BIBR.
